8.7 The FILE-SYSTEM module

delete-directory

Function

Summary

Deletes the specified directory.

Signature

delete-directory directory => ()

Arguments

directory
An instance of <pathname>.

Values

None.

Library

system

Module

file-system

Description

Deletes the specified directory. Whether or not the directory must be empty before it can be deleted is platform dependent.

See also

create-directory, page 162

delete-file, page 163

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
